text:
Gerald Weil Nachman (January 13, 1938 – April 14, 2018) was an American journalist and author. He was born in Oakland, California.
Nachman was a television writer for the "San Jose Mercury News". He was a columnist for the "New York Daily News" and writer for the "San Francisco Chronicle".
Nachman died April 14, 2018 in San Francisco, California of frontotemporal dementia at the age of 80.
